scopecontent.p: This collection consists of thirty-five photographs from one photo album.

accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.p: Textra Spinning Company Photographs #6044 P. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: 35 photographs ; Photocopy 'booklet' showing original order from photo album
